title: Do i need to pay full fees(4L) if i drop out of uni in 1st/2nd sem if i've joined through KCET ?
content: cause we KCET students had some doc that we'd to sign during the verification of documents, but according to the AICTE rules, the uni isn't suppose to charge anything extra(But, then, again its PES ffs)

comments.body: What are u planning to do after dropping out
